text: main ( ) { int t , n , i , j , s ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) a [ i ] [ j ] = - 1 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; if ( a [ i ] [ j ] < 0 || a [ i ] [ j ] > 99 ) return 0 ; } for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) a [ i ] [ j ] += ( a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] > a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) ? a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] : a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; printf ( "%d" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
